_box_content_: Greetings adventurer. Here is your new item! Thank you for your order and good luck in your quests.
Can be trade with other players.
Cannot be transferred to other players.
Can't put it in the warehouse.
You don't have enough coins to buy.
You have success purchased an item.
An error occurred while purchasing the p: An error occurred while purchasing the product
Click the &laquo;Buy&raquo; button to ge: Click the «Buy» button to get the item
The item will appear in the &laquo;Item: The item will appear in the «Item Claim» window.
You can open it from the main menu in th: You can open it from the main menu in the «Shop» section the «Item Claim» option.
Enter a search keyword that is at least: Enter a search keyword that is at least 3 letters long.
No products were found matching your req: No products were found matching your request. Try looking for something else.
Unfortunately, TERA Shop is currently cl: Unfortunately, TERA Shop is currently closed.
An error occurred while running the stor: An error occurred while running the store. Try closing the window and open again.
You are playing on the server: You are playing on the server
Promo code must be entered with the sign: Promo code must be entered with the signs of separation.
The specified promo code does not exist.
The specified promo code has expired.
The specified promo code has reached its: The specified promo code has reached its activation limit.
The specified promo code has already bee: The specified promo code has already been activated.
